description:
Healthcare workers have shown up every day and put ourselves at risk to keep everyone safe.  We have been the first line of defense against #COVID19. ⁣
⁣
Now health workers from all countries need priority access to a vaccine. This can be done, and would require countries to put aside and share with each other only a minimal amount of doses. This would help safeguard entire healthcare systems across the world.⁣ ⁣
It’s time to put #HealthworkersFirst and ensure that we get priority vaccines for #COVID19. Stand by us on #InternationalNursesDay (and every day), Check out the petition by @now4humanity •⁣
•⁣
•⁣ ⁣
#covıd19 #covid #covid_19 #RN #nightshifter #nurselife #nightshift #newyork #newyorkcity #filmyourhospital #RNlife ⁣#residentlife #md #icunurses #hospital #nationalnursesday #nursesweek
